messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Writer's Bomb LXXXVI, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Library.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our sophisticated probabilistic models, we believe that one of the station's [REDACTED] has developed command level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Writer's Bomb LXXXVI, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Toxins Storage.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Spacepizza Division

Cargo: It looks like a neighbouring station accidentally delivered their pizza to you instead

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Telecomms Admin
messages.body: Fixing wiring issues in comms, expect delays -CE xo

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Paperwork Mishap Alert

A recent bureaucratic error in the Organic Resources Department may result in personnel shortages in some departments and redundant staffing in others.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Port Quarter Maintenance.
